aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The data collected by an IoT Sensor Device.

aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The data collected by an IoT Sensor Device.
The fully anonymous Catena-X ID of the asset, valid for the Catena-X dataspace.
The information collected by a Sensor device at an instance in time.
Encapsulates the Sensor Data relevant attributes.
Encapsulates the Geo Data relevant attributes.
The angle between zenith and a plane parallel to the equator.
Geographic coordinate that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface.
The timestamp of the latest sensor reading of the geo data.
The battery level displays how much charge of the battery has been left.
The timestamp of the latest sensor reading.
The data collected by an IoT Sensor Device.
Encapsulates the Sensor Data relevant attributes.
Different types of sensors that are commonly used in various applications, measuring one of the physical properties like Temperature, Pressure, Resistance, Shock, Conduction, Heat Transfer etc.
The measured value of the sensor type.
The method under which the sensing data is transmitted from the source to the remote node.
The data collected by an IoT Sensor Device.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The data collected by an IoT Sensor Device.
Trait to ensure UUID v4 data format.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Characteristic to describe the related Geo data.
Characteristic to describe the property battery level.
Describes a Property which contains the date and time with an optional timezone.
Describes a Property which contains plain text. This is intended exclusively for human readable strings, not for identifiers, measurement values, etc.
Describes the property which contains a sensor value of data type decimal.
Describes a Property containing a reference to one of the units in the Unit Catalog.
Characteristic to describe the related Sensor data.
Characteristic that describes the property transmission method.
Characteristic describing the list of the Sensor Runtime Data property.
